metadata.synopsis: The guard at the entrance of Moonrise welcomes the player when they return (after already been formally greeted).
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load SCL_Main_Agoto -152; 21; -98Walk to the entrance of MoonriseComplete dialogWalk into town (far enough away to leave Moonrise)Return to Moonrise entrance

0.speaker: Zealot Malik
0.text: You brought Balthazar back from the darkness, I hear. The General will be pleased.
0.context: InternalNodeContext: The player has helped Balthazar (and this Nightsong) return to Moonrise. He's down in the Colony.

1.speaker: Zealot Malik
1.text: The preparations are done - we march for Baldur's Gate. I hope you'll be with us.
1.context: InternalNodeContext: The player has kidnapped Isobel and helped return Nightsong and Balthazar to Moonrise. The army of the Absolute is ready to march.

3.speaker: Zealot Malik
3.context: InternalNodeContext: The player has helped Balthazar (and this Nightsong) return to Moonrise. He's down in the Colony.

4.speaker: Zealot Malik
4.text: The cleric is with General Thorm. You'll be his favourite soon enough.
4.context: InternalNodeContext: The player has helped the cult kidnap Isobel and bring her to Moonrise.

5.speaker: Zealot Malik
5.text: Fewer lights in the darkness now.
5.context: InternalNodeContext: The player has helped the cult kidnap Isobel and bring her to Moonrise.

6.speaker: Zealot Malik
6.text: Our victory is assured. In Her name.
6.context: InternalNodeContext: The player has kidnapped Isobel and helped return Nightsong and Balthazar to Moonrise. The army of the Absolute is ready to march.

7.speaker: Zealot Malik
7.text: Shelter from the shadows a while, true soul.

8.speaker: Zealot Malik
8.text: You should report to the throne room. Z'rell likes to greet all true souls on arrival.
8.context: InternalNodeContext: Ketheric is still in private council dealing with some cultists who failed him. Default state on player's first arrival to tower.

9.speaker: Zealot Malik
9.text: General Thorm is in the throne room, passing judgement on some of the troops. Doesn't look good for them.
9.context: InternalNodeContext: Ketheric is still in private council dealing with some cultists who failed him. Default state on player's first arrival to tower.
